IPCC DDC: NCAR-DOE Land-Sea Mask

Dimension: 48 x 40 
Institute: NCAR
Remarks: 1=land, 0=sea, 
000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
000000000000000000000000000000000000011110111100
001000000000001000000000000000000000110111111100
